issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.summary: VPC - VMs cannot reach their own or other VM's public interfaces

comments.body:
fix was multi-part - a rule from an unrelated commit was causing instability.  latest shows that all combinations (see output below) are functioning as expected.  the below output shows all combinations (pub/priv/same subnet/diff subnet, self) for traffic between instances in the same security group.


[root@g-05-05 ~]# ./combo.sh 
INPUT RECORD: i-951f0c18 10.116.150.220 172.31.15.181 vpc-22ef51f6 subnet-6a11844e
INPUT RECORD: i-acfd8456 10.116.150.21 172.31.30.106 vpc-22ef51f6 subnet-96374cef
INPUT RECORD: i-a5c61a41 10.116.150.41 172.31.42.147 vpc-22ef51f6 subnet-21a7c700
INPUT RECORD: i-f6e493bf 10.116.150.193 172.31.31.246 vpc-22ef51f6 subnet-96374cef


client: 10.116.150.220
